name: Process-Taxi-Data-To-BigQuery
description: A Flex Template to process NYC Taxi parquet files and load them into a standardized BigQuery table.

parameters.name: input_bucket
parameters.label: Input GCS Bucket
parameters.helpText: The GCS bucket where the raw taxi data is stored. e.g., nyc-taxi-data-101253

parameters.name: output_table
parameters.label: Output BigQuery Table
parameters.helpText: The full BigQuery table ID to write to. Format: your-project:your_dataset.your_table

parameters.name: year
parameters.label: Year (Optional)
parameters.helpText: The year of the data to process. If omitted, all years will be processed.

parameters.name: month
parameters.label: Month (Optional)
parameters.helpText: The month of the data to process (1-12). If omitted, all months for the year will be processed.
